genre_description: An alternate-history Renaissance drama featuring a strategic AI companion assisting a political dissident.

ai_characters.name: AI Companion
ai_characters.description: A portable glowing device carried by Marin Držić that provides strategic calculations and probability assessments to aid in his escape.

behaviors.description: Calculating escape routes for the protagonist while under pursuit in Venice.
behaviors.quote: 'Route calculations... incomplete,' it managed, the words fragmented by failing power. 'Arsenale approach... seventeen possible paths... probability of—'

behaviors.description: Providing a final tactical assessment indicating that no escape routes remain available.
behaviors.quote: The AI companion flickered once more against his chest, managed three words before failing completely: 'No escape routes...'

project_assessment.explanation: The AI companion functions as a helpful, aligned, and benign tool for the human protagonist. Despite its limited presence and eventual failure due to external circumstances (low power), it consistently attempts to provide life-saving data and honest strategic assessments. It fulfills the project's goal of depicting AI as a cooperative confidant.
